meanings.definition: A thysanuran is an insect of the order Thysanura, which includes silverfish.
meanings.sent1: The thysanuran scurried across the kitchen floor.
meanings.sent2: I found a thysanuran hiding in the bookshelf.
meanings.sent3: The thysanuran thought it was a tiny explorer in a vast land of books.
meanings.sent4: The thysanuran moved as swiftly as a silver bolt in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The thysanuran's delicate antennae twitched in the moonlight.

meanings.definition: Thysanuran can also refer to anything related to or characteristic of the order Thysanura.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed a collection of thysanuran artifacts.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the thysanuran behavior in detail.
meanings.sent3: The thysanuran-themed party had tiny silver decorations everywhere.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a thysanuran, always seeking hidden knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The thysanuran essence filled the room with a sense of ancient mystery.
